title: You know what would be nice....
body: Well I just want to start with, I might be totally alone on this but having played for roughly a year now I just want to say that I wish there a non-ranked summoner's rift mode that didn't revolve around blind pick or rather I wish blind pick wasn't the only option available where everyone would rush to type in their desired role.

replies.body: because normals queue theoretically allows quicker selection of roles and normals forces people to play offroles more than the pick in ranked would normally allow. Usually this means that if you have high ping or a slow computer, you'll get alot of experience with the support role though, it's how I became a support main.
